Class Graph

java.lang.Object
fr.u_paris.gla.project.graph.Graph
public class Graph extends Object
Java object representation of the transport Network, holds the lines, sublines, stops etc...

      latitude - The latitude
      longitude - The longitude
      Returns:
      The closest stop found.
      Throws:
      Exception - Throws an exception if the current list of stops of the graph is empty.
